body:
Starting with HDF5 1.10.0, the `H5FD_class_t` structure has a new `terminate` member.  This patch adds that and initializes it to `NULL`.

Without this patch, `silo` fails to build using PGI 19.7 (see the [attached Spack build output](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5733183/spack-build-out_silo-BROKEN.txt) for details).
title: silo: HDF5 1.10.0+ introduces a new "terminate" member in the H5FD_class_t structure
